name: Peppers with stuffing
description: Chop the onions and the carrots and fry in the oil. Add the rice and the minced meat. Stir for five minutes, add the salt, savory, black and red ground pepper, put water and cook till the rice softens.Fill the peppers with the stuffing, put them on a tray with water and bake for 40 minutes at 180 C. For the sauce - mix the eggs, the yougout and the flour. Add the left water from the already baked peppers and cook in a pan till the mixture is reduced.Serve the peppers topped with the sauce.

name: SHOPSKA SALAD
description: Cut the onion on thin crescents press it a bit and add salt. Bake the peppers, strip the skin and cut on stripes. Mix the salat and season with olive oil and vinegar. Put crushed white cheeseon top a the olives.

name: Cold Cucumber Soup
description: Cut the cucumber in cubes,mix it with the chopped dill,add the chopped garlic and the walnuts mix well and season with salt and olive oil. Dilute the yorgout with the water and mix with the rest. Some people prefer it without the walnuts.

name: Pumpkin Pie
description: Sift the flouron a plate add salt vinegar, olive oil and the tepid water. Blend to make medium soft dough. Devide into 4 parts, rub with olive oil and rest it for 30 min.Sautee the pumpkins with butter, leave it to get cold, add the sinammon and mix. Roll out the dough thin like e newspaper's sheet, put the pumpkins and the walnutsce add sugar and wrap in the form of a snail. Put some olive oil on it and bake it in the oven for 45 min om 180 C

name: Sarmi
description: Cooking: Chop the onions and fry. Put the rice, stir and put the red pepper, add half teacup warm water and salt. After ten minites take it off, add the meat the black pepper and salt. Unfold the cabbage leaves and put the mixture inside. Wrap the leaves and put the pieces in a cooking pan, cover with warm water and cook till ready.

name: Carp with walnuts
description: Cooking:Chop thre onions the walnuts, the mushrooms one tomato and fry for 5 minutes in olive oil. Add half spoon black pepper. In the meantime wash the carp, salt it and rub it with olive oil. Chop one onion, heath half tea cupolive oil add the onion plus the rice. Cook for three minutes and put the rest of the chopped tomats. Fill the carp with the stuffing and close the belly with toothpicks. In a plate put the rice, add half teaspoon salt, allspice, bay leaf, put the fish on the rice and cook in preheated oven on 170 C for 75 min.

name: White cheese in earthenware jug
description: Chop the tomato and place it on the bottom of the jug with 2 soup spoons butter. Sprinkle with savory, put the white cheese and the chili pepper. Bake in oven for 10 min 170C. Put the egg on topand black pepper and bake in the oven 180C for another5-20 min.

name: Wine kebap with veal
description: Cut the meat into cubes, salt the meat and rub with ground black pepper, add two soup spoons olive oil. Leave the meat for one hour. Fry the onion, add the meatsalt and ground black pepper the white wine and stir. Pour the mashed tomatoes, the bay leaves with sugar and pimento. Pour hot water to cover the meat Fry the butter with the flourand cook for 5 minutes to thicken the sauce. Seerve with whiteboiled rice.
